segments.advisor_message: So, uh, can you tell me where you, like, uh live officially? I mean what country you're, y'know, domiciled in?
segments.client_message: Oh right, um, I’m, uh, living in Spain actually. But, uh, I was born in the UK.

segments.advisor_message: Got it! And, um, are you a tax resident in Spain too?
segments.client_message: Yeah, I'm considered a tax resident there, 'cause I’ve been here more than, um, 183 days in the, uh, last year.
